refnamediv.refpurpose: Gets the clicked-on pixel coordinates from an image

listitem.listitem: the number of rows in the considered image, or the image itself, depending on what's more convenient to the user.
the number of the scilab graphical window. Defaults to the current active window.
the (row,col) coordinate of the pixel that have been clicked on the image.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Function xgetpixel interactively shows the (row,col) position of the mouse cursor over an image ploted into scilab graphic.
